outputs.output_descr: The project aims to overcome barriers to sustainability of Thailand's protected area (PA) system by addressing effective management and sustainable financing of protected areas. The project will build the confidence and capacities of the PA management authorities and provide them with resources to test innovative PA management and financing schemes. In addition, it will support the development of appropriate incentives.

project_descr: PIMS 3825: GEFSEC ID: 3517 Catalyzing Sustainability of Thailand%s Protected Area System.
project_title: PIMS3825 Catalyzing Sustainability of TH's PA System
